title: FS: Autographed T206 Cobb -- Taking Offers
author: calvindog

posts.post_title: FS: Autographed T206 Cobb -- Taking Offers
posts.post_content:
Taking offers on this beauty -- signed by Cobb's personal plumber: "Joseph Cosey/Ty's Plumber."  JSA authenticated.  If you can't afford Ty's autograph on a T206, this is the next best thing!

[URL="http://www.flickr.com/photos/calvindog/8413305401/"][IMG]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8373/8413305401_510f6106d1_o.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
I am holding out for one signed by Ty's electrician.
I hear there is one with an inscription out there referring to him "cleaning Ty's pipes," so I'm going to wait.
I'm waiting for one signed by Al Stump:D
All kidding aside, that is a beautiful looking card Jeff.....
Id rather have than card without his plumbers autograph...
Ha, I like it.  Quirky.  Definitely a conversation piece.

I might consider trading my T206 of Chief Bender signed by his gardener. As you can see, the guy wasn't much of a speller, but he has a magician with rhododendrons. If you're willing to throw in something to even things out, maybe we can talk.
Is it possible to still get Ty's plumbers signature through the mail?  And if it says "just say no to (butt) crack" I will pay extra!!

Jeff, are you aware that Joseph Cosey was the favorite alias of notorious forger Martin Coneely. Items forged by Coneely are valuable in their own right.  You may have an item that has more value than you think.

I would be interested how JSA authenticated the signature.  Did you submit the item yourself?

How about this combo...not proud of this photoshop

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/g5nlp9G.jpg[/IMG]

Any relation to Joe the Plumber of 2008 campaign fame?
JimB
